title: Rapha Cycling brand
content:
Hello,

Anyone knows what this font is called and where I could buy it?

[http://www.rapha.cc/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221135736/http:/www.rapha.cc/ "http://www.rapha.cc/")

Thank you

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221135736/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_211.png) | 30.84 KB |
author: weplay

comments.content:
We've had this one before. It's not a font - it's a one-off piece of lettering for the logo that I did in early 2004.

Nick Cooke
Good job!! Do you have any website with some other works you did?

No I don't, I really should get round to it.

In the meantime there's [this.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221135736/http:/www.type.co.uk/index.php?p=GType)

Nick Cooke
